headline: LMND Q4 Loss Narrower Than Expected on Solid Underwriting
summary: LMND narrows Q4 loss, beats revenue estimates with 53% growth, rising premiums and stronger margins, while boosting its 2026 outlook.

raw.headline: LMND Q4 Loss Narrower Than Expected on Solid Underwriting
raw.summary: LMND narrows Q4 loss, beats revenue estimates with 53% growth, rising premiums and stronger margins, while boosting its 2026 outlook.

headline: How The Assurant (AIZ) Story Is Shifting As Analysts Recalibrate Fair Value Around US$261
summary: Analysts have fine tuned their fair value estimate for Assurant to about US$261, a modest adjustment from the prior US$259.33 that reflects updated thinking on the stock’s potential. Bulls see this as a calibration that still lines up with their views on the company’s setup, while bears point to at least one US$9 price target cut as a sign of more caution creeping in. As you read on, you will see how these shifting targets shape the evolving story around Assurant and what it could mean for...

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Assurant Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Assurant has trailed the S&P 500 over the past year, but analysts still see a constructive path forward and remain moderately bullish on the stock’s outlook.

raw.headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Assurant Stock Will Climb or Sink?
raw.summary: Assurant has trailed the S&P 500 over the past year, but analysts still see a constructive path forward and remain moderately bullish on the stock’s outlook.

headline: 1 Mid-Cap Stock on Our Buy List and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
